original_text: All these people joined with their leaders and they promised to obey the agreement. They agreed that God should punish them if they did not obey all of God's Law. That was the Law that God had given to his servant Moses. They promised very strongly to obey all the commands, rules and laws of the Lord, our Lord. All these people joined with their leaders and they promised to obey the agreement. They agreed that God should punish them if they did not obey all of God's Law. That was the Law that God had given to his servant Moses. They promised very strongly to obey all the commands, rules and laws of the Lord, our Lord.
korean_text: 다 그들의 형제 귀족들을 따라 저주로 맹세하기를 우리가 하나님의 종 모세를 통하여 주신 하나님의 율법을 따라 우리 주 여호와의 모든 계명과 규례와 율례를 지켜 행하여

sentences.original_text: All these people joined with their leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들이 그들의 지도자들과 함께 합류했습니다

sentences.original_text: and they promised to obey the agreement
They agreed that God should punish them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 그들을 벌하셔야 한다고 동의했습니다

sentences.original_text: if they did not obey all of God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 하나님의 모든 법을 순종하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: that God had given to his servant Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그의 종 모세에게 주신 법

sentences.original_text: to obey all the commands, rules and laws
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 명령, 규칙, 그리고 법을 순종하기로

sentences.original_text: All these people joined with their leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들이 그들의 지도자들과 함께 합류했습니다

sentences.original_text: and they promised to obey the agreement
They agreed that God should punish them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 그들을 벌하셔야 한다고 동의했습니다

sentences.original_text: if they did not obey all of God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 하나님의 모든 법을 순종하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: that God had given to his servant Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그의 종 모세에게 주신 법

sentences.original_text: to obey all the commands, rules and laws
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 명령, 규칙, 그리고 법을 순종하기로
